name: Ammo: Only One
description:
A puzzle platformer where the objective is to kill all the enemy cyborgs within each level to pass. The catch is, your ammo is only one.

There are 16 levels in the game at the moment, however I do plan on working on this further after the game jam (GMTK Game Jam 2019)

Controls:

A,D - Move left / right

W / Space - Jump

Mouse Click - Shoot

R - Reload level
